channel.title: Homelessness on Weazel News RP
channel.description: Recent content in Homelessness on Weazel News RP

item.title: Homelessness Plagues the City
item.description: At the beginning of this piece Weazel News wanted to learn more about the state of homelessness in the Los Santo’s. We wanted to understand what brought the people to the state of being homeless and how the city could step up as a community and help solve the problem. What we didn’t expect is the wide range of answers and opinions on the topic as well as the stories we heard from all walks of life.
